$XRP (4H), Liquidity & Reaction Zone

What to watch next:

Loss of structure: A clean breakdown below this area would invalidate the bullish continuation and shift focus back to lower liquidity levels.


This is a spot where reaction matters more than prediction. Let price show its hand before committing.

As always, patience > chasing moves.

$BTC  may still dominate headlines, but XRP is quietly building a supply story that‚Äôs hard to ignore. In less than two months, XRP ETFs have already pulled in over $1B in inflows, locking up around 746M tokens and signaling steady institutional demand.  If that pace continues, ETF assets could reach $5B by mid-2026, potentially removing up to 2.6B XRP - nearly 4% of total supply - from active circulation. Despite lagging below $2 for months, $XRP  has started to stabilize above key support near $1.88.
